00020 namespace {
00021 double toLogProb(double f1, double f2) {
00022   return std::log(1.0 * f1 / f2) - VERY_SMALL_LOGPROB;  // avoid 0
00023 }
00024 }

00028 #define DCONF(file) create_filename(dicdir, std::string(file)).c_str()
00029 
00030 class HMMLearner {
00031  public:
00032   static int run(Param *param) {
00033     DictionaryRewriter rewrite;
00034 
00035 
00036     const std::string dicdir = param->get<std::string>("dicdir");
00037     CHECK_DIE(param->load(DCONF(DICRC)))
00038         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(DICRC);
00039 
00040     CHECK_DIE(rewrite.open(DCONF(REWRITE_FILE)))
00041         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(REWRITE_FILE);
00042 
00043     const std::vector<std::string> files = param->rest_args();
00044     if (files.size() != 2) {
00045       std::cout << "Usage: " <<
00046           param->program_name() << " corpus model" << std::endl;
00047       return -1;
00048     }
00049 
00050     const std::string ifile = files[0];
00051     const std::string model = files[1];
00052 
00053     const bool text_only = param->get<bool>("text-only");
00054     const bool em_hmm = param->get<bool>("em-hmm");
00055     const std::string bos_feature = param->get<std::string>("bos-feature");
00056 
00057     CHECK_DIE(!bos_feature.empty()) << "bos-feature is empty";
00058 
00059     char line[BUF_SIZE];
00060     char *col[8];
00061     std::string word, feature;
00062     std::string ufeature, lfeature, rfeature;
00063     std::string plfeature, prfeature;
00064     std::map<std::string, std::map<std::string, double> > emission;
00065     std::map<std::string, std::map<std::string, double> > transition;
00066 
00067     // corpus
00068     if (em_hmm) {
00069       std::ifstream ifs(ifile.c_str());
00070       CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << ifile;
00071       size_t size = 0;
00072       while (ifs.getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00073         if (std::strcmp("EOS", line) == 0) {
00074           if (++size % 100 == 0)
00075             std::cout << size << "... " << std::flush;
00076           continue;
00077         }
00078 
00079         CHECK_DIE(tokenize(line, "\t", col, 4) == 4)
00080             << "format error\n";
00081         CHECK_DIE(std::strcmp("B", col[0]) == 0 &&
00082                   std::strcmp("U", col[0]) == 0)
00083             << "format error\n";
00084         if (col[0][0] == 'B') {  // bigram
00085           feature = col[1];
00086           CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(feature,
00087                                     &ufeature,
00088                                     &lfeature,
00089                                     &rfeature))
00090               << "rewrite failed";
00091           prfeature = rfeature;
00092           feature = col[2];
00093           CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(feature,
00094                                     &ufeature,
00095                                     &lfeature,
00096                                     &rfeature))
00097               << "rewrite failed";
00098           plfeature = lfeature;
00099           transition[prfeature][plfeature] += std::atof(col[3]);
00100         } else {   // unigram
00101           feature = col[2];
00102           CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(feature,
00103                                     &ufeature,
00104                                     &lfeature,
00105                                     &rfeature))
00106               << "rewrite failed";
00107           std::strncpy(line, ufeature.c_str(), sizeof(line));
00108           size_t n = tokenize2(line, "\t ", col, 2);
00109           CHECK_DIE(n == 2) << "format error in rewrite.def: " << ufeature;
00110           ufeature = col[0];
00111           word = col[1];
00112           emission[ufeature][word] += atof(col[3]);
00113         }
00114         ++size;
00115       }
00116     } else {
00117       std::ifstream ifs(ifile.c_str());
00118       CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << ifile;
00119 
00120       CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(bos_feature,
00121                                 &ufeature,
00122                                 &plfeature,
00123                                 &prfeature)) << "rewrite failed";
00124 
00125       size_t size = 0;
00126       while (ifs.getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00127         if (std::strcmp("EOS", line) == 0) {
00128           if (++size % 100 == 0)
00129             std::cout << size << "... " << std::flush;
00130           feature = bos_feature;
00131         } else {
00132           CHECK_DIE(tokenize(line, "\t", col, 2) == 2)
00133               << "format error\n";
00134           feature = col[1];
00135         }
00136 
00137         CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(feature,
00138                                   &ufeature,
00139                                   &lfeature,
00140                                   &rfeature))
00141             << "rewrite failed";
00142 
00143         std::strncpy(line, ufeature.c_str(), sizeof(line));
00144         // unigram rule must contain ' '
00145         const size_t n = tokenize2(line, "\t ", col, 2);
00146         CHECK_DIE(n == 2) << "format error in rewrite.def: " << ufeature;
00147         ufeature = col[0];
00148         word = col[1];
00149         transition[prfeature][lfeature] += 1.0;
00150         emission[ufeature][word] += 1.0;
00151         plfeature = lfeature;
00152         prfeature = rfeature;
00153       }
00154     }
00155 
00156     // dictionary
00157     {
00158       std::vector<std::string> dic;
00159       enum_csv_dictionaries(dicdir.c_str(), &dic);
00160 
00161       const double freq = param->get<double>("default-emission-freq");
00162       CHECK_DIE(freq >= 0.0) << " default-emission-freq must be >= 0 "
00163                              << freq;
00164 
00165       for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator it = dic.begin();
00166            it != dic.end(); ++it) {
00167         std::cout << "reading " << *it << " ... " << std::flush;
00168 
00169         std::ifstream ifs(it->c_str());
00170         CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << *it;
00171 
00172         while (ifs.getline(line, sizeof(line))) {
00173           CHECK_DIE(tokenizeCSV(line, col, 5) == 5) << "format error";
00174           feature = col[4];
00175           CHECK_DIE(rewrite.rewrite(feature,
00176                                     &ufeature,
00177                                     &lfeature,
00178                                     &rfeature)) << "rewrite failed";
00179           std::strncpy(line, ufeature.c_str(), sizeof(line));
00180           const size_t n = tokenize2(line, "\t ", col, 2);
00181           CHECK_DIE(n == 2) << "format error: " << ufeature;
00182           ufeature = col[0];
00183           word = col[1];
00184           emission[ufeature][word] += freq;
00185         }
00186 
00187         std::cout << std::endl;
00188       }
00189     }
00190 
00191     {
00192       std::cout << std::endl;
00193       std::string txtfile = model;
00194       txtfile += ".txt";
00195 
00196       std::ofstream ofs(txtfile.c_str());
00197       CHECK_DIE(ofs) << "permission denied: " << model;
00198 
00199       ofs.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00200       ofs.precision(24);
00201 
00202       // bigram
00203       for (std::map<std::string, std::map<std::string, double> >
00204                ::const_iterator
00205                it = transition.begin();
00206            it != transition.end(); ++it) {
00207         double freq = 0.0;
00208         for (std::map<std::string, double>::
00209                  const_iterator it2 = it->second.begin();
00210              it2 != it->second.end(); ++it2) {
00211           freq += it2->second;
00212         }
00213 
00214         for (std::map<std::string, double>
00215                  ::const_iterator it2 = it->second.begin();
00216              it2 != it->second.end(); ++it2)
00217           ofs << toLogProb(it2->second, freq) << '\t'
00218               << 'B' << ':' << it->first << '/' << it2->first << std::endl;
00219       }
00220 
00221       // unigram
00222       for (std::map<std::string, std::map<std::string, double> >
00223                ::const_iterator
00224                it = emission.begin();
00225            it != emission.end(); ++it) {
00226         double freq = 0.0;
00227         for (std::map<std::string, double>
00228                  ::const_iterator it2 = it->second.begin();
00229              it2 != it->second.end(); ++it2)
00230           freq += it2->second;
00231 
00232         for (std::map<std::string, double>
00233                  ::const_iterator it2 = it->second.begin();
00234              it2 != it->second.end(); ++it2) {
00235           std::string w = it2->first;
00236           CHECK_DIE(escape_csv_element(&w));
00237           ofs << toLogProb(it2->second, freq) << '\t'
00238               << 'U' << ':' << it->first << ' ' << w << std::endl;
00239         }
00240       }
00241 
00242       ofs.close();
00243 
00244       if (!text_only) {
00245         EncoderFeatureIndex feature_index;
00246         CHECK_DIE(feature_index.convert(txtfile.c_str(), model.c_str()))
00247             << "unexpected error in LBFGS routin";
00248       }
00249 
00250       std::cout << "Done!" << std::endl;
00251     }
00252 
00253     return 0;
00254   }
00255 };
00256 
00257 class OLLearner {
00258  public:
00259   static int run(Param *param) {
00260     const std::string dicdir = param->get<std::string>("dicdir");
00261     CHECK_DIE(param->load(DCONF(DICRC)))
00262         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(DICRC);
00263 
00264     const std::vector<std::string> files = param->rest_args();
00265     if (files.size() != 2) {
00266       std::cout << "Usage: " <<
00267           param->program_name() << " corpus model" << std::endl;
00268       return -1;
00269     }
00270 
00271     const std::string ifile = files[0];
00272     const std::string model = files[1];
00273 
00274     const double C = param->get<double>("cost");
00275     const bool   text_only = param->get<bool>("text-only");
00276     const size_t eval_size = param->get<size_t>("eval-size");
00277     const size_t unk_eval_size = param->get<size_t>("unk-eval-size");
00278     const size_t iter = param->get<size_t>("iteration");
00279     const size_t freq = param->get<size_t>("freq");
00280 
00281     EncoderFeatureIndex feature_index;
00282     LearnerTokenizer tokenizer;
00283     FreeList<LearnerPath> path_freelist(PATH_FREELIST_SIZE);
00284     std::vector<double> expected;
00285     std::vector<double> observed;
00286     std::vector<double> alpha;
00287 
00288     std::cout.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00289     std::cout.precision(5);
00290 
00291     {
00292       CHECK_DIE(C > 0) << "cost parameter is out of range: " << C;
00293       CHECK_DIE(eval_size > 0) << "eval-size is out of range: " << eval_size;
00294       CHECK_DIE(unk_eval_size > 0) <<
00295           "unk-eval-size is out of range: " << unk_eval_size;
00296       CHECK_DIE(tokenizer.open(*param)) << tokenizer.what();
00297       CHECK_DIE(feature_index.open(*param)) << feature_index.what();
00298       CHECK_DIE(iter >= 1 && iter <= 100) << "iteration should be <= 100";
00299       CHECK_DIE(freq == 1) << "freq must be 1";
00300     }
00301 
00302     std::cout << "reading corpus ..." << std::flush;
00303 
00304     EncoderLearnerTagger x;
00305     for (size_t i = 0; i < 10; ++i) {
00306       std::ifstream ifs(ifile.c_str());
00307       CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << ifile;
00308       while (ifs) {
00309         path_freelist.free();
00310         tokenizer.clear();
00311         std::fill(expected.begin(), expected.end(), 0.0);
00312         std::fill(observed.begin(), observed.end(), 0.0);
00313 
00314         CHECK_DIE(x.open(&tokenizer,
00315                          &path_freelist,
00316                          &feature_index,
00317                          eval_size,
00318                          unk_eval_size)) << x.what();
00319         CHECK_DIE(x.read(&ifs, &observed)) << x.what();
00320 
00321         if (x.empty()) {
00322           continue;
00323         }
00324 
00325         alpha.resize(feature_index.size());
00326         expected.resize(feature_index.size());
00327         observed.resize(feature_index.size());
00328         feature_index.set_alpha(&alpha[0]);
00329 
00330         x.online_update(&expected[0]);
00331 
00332         size_t micro_p = 0;
00333         size_t micro_r = 0;
00334         size_t micro_c = 0;
00335         size_t err = x.eval(&micro_c, &micro_p, &micro_r);
00336         std::cout << micro_p << " " << micro_r << " " << micro_c << " " << err << std::endl;
00337 
00338         // gradient
00339         double margin = 0.0;
00340         double s = 0.0;
00341         for (size_t k = 0; k < feature_index.size(); ++k) {
00342           const double tmp = (observed[k] - expected[k]);
00343           margin += alpha[k] * tmp;
00344           s += tmp * tmp;
00345         }
00346 
00347         // Passive Aggressive I algorithm
00348         if (s > 0.0) {
00349           const double diff = _max(0.0, 10 - margin) / s;
00350           if (diff > 0.0) {
00351             for (size_t k = 0; k < feature_index.size(); ++k) {
00352               alpha[k] += diff * (observed[k] - expected[k]);
00353             }
00354           }
00355         }
00356       }
00357     }
00358 
00359     std::cout << "\nDone! writing model file ... " << std::endl;
00360 
00361     std::string txtfile = model;
00362     txtfile += ".txt";
00363 
00364     CHECK_DIE(feature_index.save(txtfile.c_str()))
00365         << feature_index.what();
00366 
00367     if (!text_only) {
00368       CHECK_DIE(feature_index.convert(txtfile.c_str(), model.c_str()))
00369           << feature_index.what();
00370     }
00371 
00372     return true;
00373   }
00374 };

00377 #ifdef MECAB_USE_THREAD
00378 class learner_thread: public thread {
00379  public:
00380   unsigned short start_i;
00381   unsigned short thread_num;
00382   size_t size;
00383   size_t micro_p;
00384   size_t micro_r;
00385   size_t micro_c;
00386   size_t err;
00387   double f;
00388   EncoderLearnerTagger **x;
00389   std::vector<double> expected;
00390   void run() {
00391     micro_p = micro_r = micro_c = err = 0;
00392     f = 0.0;
00393     std::fill(expected.begin(), expected.end(), 0.0);
00394     for (size_t i = start_i; i < size; i += thread_num) {
00395       f += x[i]->gradient(&expected[0]);
00396       err += x[i]->eval(&micro_c, &micro_p, &micro_r);
00397     }
00398   }
00399 };
00400 #endif
00401 
00402 class CRFLearner {
00403  public:
00404   static int run(Param *param) {
00405     const std::string dicdir = param->get<std::string>("dicdir");
00406     CHECK_DIE(param->load(DCONF(DICRC)))
00407         << "no such file or directory: " << DCONF(DICRC);
00408 
00409     const std::vector<std::string> &files = param->rest_args();
00410     if (files.size() != 2) {
00411       std::cout << "Usage: " <<
00412           param->program_name() << " corpus model" << std::endl;
00413       return -1;
00414     }
00415 
00416     const std::string ifile = files[0];
00417     const std::string model = files[1];
00418 
00419     const double C = param->get<double>("cost");
00420     const double eta = param->get<double>("eta");
00421     const bool text_only = param->get<bool>("text-only");
00422     const size_t eval_size = param->get<size_t>("eval-size");
00423     const size_t unk_eval_size = param->get<size_t>("unk-eval-size");
00424     const size_t freq = param->get<size_t>("freq");
00425     const size_t thread_num = param->get<size_t>("thread");
00426 
00427     EncoderFeatureIndex feature_index;
00428     LearnerTokenizer tokenizer;
00429     FreeList<LearnerPath> path_freelist(PATH_FREELIST_SIZE);
00430     std::vector<double> expected;
00431     std::vector<double> observed;
00432     std::vector<double> alpha;
00433     std::vector<EncoderLearnerTagger *> x_;
00434 
00435     std::cout.setf(std::ios::fixed, std::ios::floatfield);
00436     std::cout.precision(5);
00437 
00438     std::ifstream ifs(ifile.c_str());
00439     {
00440       CHECK_DIE(C > 0) << "cost parameter is out of range: " << C;
00441       CHECK_DIE(eta > 0) "eta is out of range: " << eta;
00442       CHECK_DIE(eval_size > 0) << "eval-size is out of range: " << eval_size;
00443       CHECK_DIE(unk_eval_size > 0) <<
00444           "unk-eval-size is out of range: " << unk_eval_size;
00445       CHECK_DIE(freq > 0) <<
00446           "freq is out of range: " << unk_eval_size;
00447       CHECK_DIE(thread_num > 0 && thread_num <= 512)
00448           << "# thread is invalid: " << thread_num;
00449       CHECK_DIE(tokenizer.open(*param)) << tokenizer.what();
00450       CHECK_DIE(feature_index.open(*param)) << feature_index.what();
00451       CHECK_DIE(ifs) << "no such file or directory: " << ifile;
00452     }
00453 
00454     std::cout << "reading corpus ..." << std::flush;
00455 
00456     while (ifs) {
00457       EncoderLearnerTagger *_x = new EncoderLearnerTagger();
00458 
00459       CHECK_DIE(_x->open(&tokenizer, &path_freelist,
00460                          &feature_index,
00461                          eval_size,
00462                          unk_eval_size))
00463           << _x->what();
00464 
00465       CHECK_DIE(_x->read(&ifs, &observed)) << _x->what();
00466 
00467       if (!_x->empty())
00468         x_.push_back(_x);
00469       else
00470         delete _x;
00471 
00472       if (x_.size() % 100 == 0)
00473         std::cout << x_.size() << "... " << std::flush;
00474     }
00475 
00476     feature_index.shrink(freq, &observed);
00477     feature_index.clearcache();
00478 
00479     int converge = 0;
00480     double old_f = 0.0;
00481     size_t psize = feature_index.size();
00482     observed.resize(psize);
00483     LBFGS lbfgs;
00484 
00485     alpha.resize(psize);
00486     expected.resize(psize);
00487     std::fill(alpha.begin(), alpha.end(), 0.0);
00488 
00489     feature_index.set_alpha(&alpha[0]);
00490 
00491     std::cout << std::endl;
00492     std::cout << "Number of sentences: " << x_.size() << std::endl;
00493     std::cout << "Number of features:  " << psize     << std::endl;
00494     std::cout << "eta:                 " << eta       << std::endl;
00495     std::cout << "freq:                " << freq      << std::endl;
00496 #ifdef MECAB_USE_THREAD
00497     std::cout << "threads:             " << thread_num << std::endl;
00498 #endif
00499     std::cout << "C(sigma^2):          " << C          << std::endl
00500               << std::endl;
00501 
00502 #ifdef MECAB_USE_THREAD
00503     std::vector<learner_thread> thread;
00504     if (thread_num > 1) {
00505       thread.resize(thread_num);
00506       for (size_t i = 0; i < thread_num; ++i) {
00507         thread[i].start_i = i;
00508         thread[i].size = x_.size();
00509         thread[i].thread_num = thread_num;
00510         thread[i].x = &x_[0];
00511         thread[i].expected.resize(expected.size());
00512       }
00513     }
00514 #endif
00515 
00516     for (size_t itr = 0; ;  ++itr) {
00517       std::fill(expected.begin(), expected.end(), 0.0);
00518 
00519       double f = 0.0;
00520       size_t err = 0;
00521       size_t micro_p = 0;
00522       size_t micro_r = 0;
00523       size_t micro_c = 0;
00524 
00525 #ifdef MECAB_USE_THREAD
00526       if (thread_num > 1) {
00527         for (size_t i = 0; i < thread_num; ++i)
00528           thread[i].start();
00529 
00530         for (size_t i = 0; i < thread_num; ++i)
00531           thread[i].join();
00532 
00533         for (size_t i = 0; i < thread_num; ++i) {
00534           f += thread[i].f;
00535           err += thread[i].err;
00536           micro_r += thread[i].micro_r;
00537           micro_p += thread[i].micro_p;
00538           micro_c += thread[i].micro_c;
00539           for (size_t k = 0; k < psize; ++k)
00540             expected[k] += thread[i].expected[k];
00541         }
00542       }
00543       else
00544 #endif
00545       {
00546         for (size_t i = 0; i < x_.size(); ++i) {
00547           f += x_[i]->gradient(&expected[0]);
00548           err += x_[i]->eval(&micro_c, &micro_p, &micro_r);
00549         }
00550       }
00551 
00552       const double p = 1.0 * micro_c / micro_p;
00553       const double r = 1.0 * micro_c / micro_r;
00554       const double micro_f = 2 * p * r /(p + r);
00555 
00556       for (size_t i = 0; i < psize; ++i) {
00557         f += (alpha[i] * alpha[i]/(2.0 * C));
00558         expected[i] = expected[i] - observed[i] + alpha[i]/C;
00559       }
00560 
00561       double diff = (itr == 0 ? 1.0 : std::fabs(1.0 *(old_f - f) )/old_f);
00562       std::cout << "iter="    << itr
00563                 << " err="    << 1.0 * err/x_.size()
00564                 << " F="      << micro_f
00565                 << " target=" << f
00566                 << " diff="   << diff << std::endl;
00567       old_f = f;
00568 
00569       if (diff < eta)
00570         converge++;
00571       else
00572         converge = 0;
00573 
00574       if (converge == 3)
00575         break;  // 3 is ad-hoc
00576 
00577       int ret = lbfgs.optimize(psize, &alpha[0], f, &expected[0], false, C);
00578 
00579       CHECK_DIE(ret > 0) << "unexpected error in LBFGS routin";
00580     }
00581 
00582     std::cout << "\nDone! writing model file ... " << std::endl;
00583 
00584     std::string txtfile = model;
00585     txtfile += ".txt";
00586 
00587     CHECK_DIE(feature_index.save(txtfile.c_str()))
00588         << feature_index.what();
00589 
00590     if (!text_only) {
00591       CHECK_DIE(feature_index.convert(txtfile.c_str(), model.c_str()))
00592           << feature_index.what();
00593     }
00594 
00595     return 0;
00596   }
00597 };
00598 
00599 class Learner {
00600  public:
00601   static bool run(int argc, char **argv) {
00602     static const MeCab::Option long_options[] = {
00603       { "dicdir",   'd',  ".",     "DIR",
00604         "set DIR as dicdir(default \".\" )" },
00605       { "cost",     'c',  "1.0",   "FLOAT",
00606         "set FLOAT for cost C for constraints violatoin" },
00607       { "training-algorithm",   'a',  "crf",
00608         "(crf|hmm|oll)", "set training algorithm" },
00609       { "em-hmm", 'E', 0, 0,       "use EM in HMM training (experimental)" },
00610       { "freq",     'f',  "1",     "INT",
00611         "set the frequency cut-off (default 1)" },
00612       { "default-emission-freq", 'E',  "0.5",     "FLOAT",
00613         "set the default emission frequency for HMM (default 0.5)" },
00614       { "default-transition-freq", 'T',  "0.5",     "FLOAT",
00615         "set the default transition frequency for HMM (default 0.0)" },
00616       { "eta",      'e',  "0.001", "DIR",
00617         "set FLOAT for tolerance of termination criterion" },
00618       { "iteration", 'N', "10",    "INT",
00619         "numer of iterations in online learning (default 1)" },
00620       { "thread",   'p',  "1",     "INT",    "number of threads(default 1)" },
00621       { "build",    'b',  0,  0,   "build binary model from text model"},
00622       { "text-only", 'y',  0,  0,   "output text model only" },
00623       { "version",  'v',  0,   0,  "show the version and exit"  },
00624       { "help",     'h',  0,   0,  "show this help and exit."      },
00625       { 0, 0, 0, 0 }
00626     };
00627 
00628     Param param;
00629 
00630     if (!param.open(argc, argv, long_options)) {
00631       std::cout << param.what() << "\n\n" <<  COPYRIGHT
00632                 << "\ntry '--help' for more information." << std::endl;
00633       return -1;
00634     }
00635 
00636     if (!param.help_version()) {
00637       return 0;
00638     }
00639 
00640     // build mode
00641     {
00642       const bool build = param.get<bool>("build");
00643       if (build) {
00644         const std::vector<std::string> files = param.rest_args();
00645         if (files.size() != 2) {
00646           std::cout << "Usage: " <<
00647               param.program_name() << " corpus model" << std::endl;
00648           return -1;
00649         }
00650         const std::string ifile = files[0];
00651         const std::string model = files[1];
00652         EncoderFeatureIndex feature_index;
00653         CHECK_DIE(feature_index.convert(ifile.c_str(), model.c_str()))
00654             << feature_index.what();
00655         return 0;
00656       }
00657     }
00658 
00659     std::string type = param.get<std::string>("training-algorithm");
00660     toLower(&type);
00661     if (type == "crf") {
00662       return CRFLearner::run(&param);
00663     } else if (type == "hmm") {
00664       return HMMLearner::run(&param);
00665     } else if (type == "oll") {
00666       return OLLearner::run(&param);
00667     } else {
00668       std::cerr << "unknown type: " << type << std::endl;
00669       return -1;
00670     }
00671 
00672     return 0;
00673   }
00674 };
00675 }
00676 
00677 int mecab_cost_train(int argc, char **argv) {
00678   return MeCab::Learner::run(argc, argv);
00679 }
